thread.title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year
thread.title_full: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year - Yahoo News

author: news.yahoo.com
title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year
text:
View gallery FILE - In this Feb. 27, 2005 file photo, Chris Rock hosts the 77th Academy Awards telecast in Los An … View gallery FILE - In this Feb. 28, 2015 file photo, comedian Chris Rock performs at Comedy Central's " … View gallery FILE - In this Jan. 4, 2015 file photo, comedian Chris Rock arrives at Variety’s 10 Directors to Wat … LOS ANGELES (AP) — Chris Rock is coming back to host the Oscars for a second time.
The show's producers say the prolific comedian-filmmaker will be at the helm for the 88th Academy Awards on Feb. 28 at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, California.
Producers David Hill and Reginald Hudlin called Rock "the MVP of the entertainment industry."
Rock, who hosted the 77th Oscars in 2005, has won four Emmy Awards for his comedy series and specials. He recently directed the comedy special "Amy Schumer: Live at the Apollo" for HBO. In 2014, he wrote, directed and starred in the feature "Top Five," and in 2009 produced, wrote and starred in the documentary "Good Hair."
He was a cast member on "Saturday Night Live" from 1990 to 1993.
___
